channel.title: [317/Delta] Spawning Error

item.title: [317/Delta] Spawning Error
item.dc:creator: @tehbomb tehbomb
item.description:
@tehbomb wrote:

Alright, well for the passed day or so i’ve 'been trying to figure out WHY i can’t add my sword to my server. I’ve tryed to add it on 3 or so different sources with no luck, and even my mate who’s more intelectual then me in java wasn’t able to add it to his.

I’ve searched the forums, looked at a shittonne of guides, but still when i do “::pickup 14832 1” (my swords code, i’ve tryed changing it about 10 times or so, still didn’t do anything) all it does is null my client/account. I’ve tried changing the model numbers, so it doesn’t interfere with others, I’ve tried changing the spawn code, and I’ve also tried using multiple ints, with still no luck.

I’ve added 5 or so other items with no trouble at all, but this sword, i seem to be having a very hard time with. So what i want to know is, did i do something wrong while making it? Was it made too complex with too many faces or something? If anyone could explain why i’m un-able to add it into my server, so that i could maybe fix the problem, it would be much appreciated. I spent a good 10 hours making this sword, and it would suck to have all that time go to waste.

I also made it .Dat, then Gziped it, and i’ve re-tried to do this a tonne of times, i have no clue why its not working.

Ints i used:

if(i == 14783) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14519; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 552; class8.anInt198 = 28; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 2; class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14518;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14518;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "CND Blade";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Made by Joey".getBytes();//examin info }

CNDbladeW=14518
CNDbladeD=14519

Here it is, if this helps any.

Read full topic
